00024     KTSimpleFFT::KTSimpleFFT() :
00025             KTFFT(),
00026             fTransform(NULL),
00027             fTransformFlag(string("")),
00028             fIsInitialized(kFALSE),
00029             fIsDataReady(kFALSE),

00034     KTSimpleFFT::KTSimpleFFT(Int_t timeSize) :
00035             KTFFT(),
00036             fTransform(new TFFTRealComplex(timeSize, kFALSE)),
00037             fTransformFlag(string("")),
00038             fIsInitialized(kFALSE),
00039             fIsDataReady(kFALSE),
00040             fFreqBinWidth(1.)

00042     }

00044     KTSimpleFFT::~KTSimpleFFT()

00049     void KTSimpleFFT::InitializeFFT()
00050     {
00051         fTransform->Init(fTransformFlag.c_str(), 0, NULL);
00052         fIsInitialized = kTRUE;
00053         return;
00054     }
00055 
00056     void KTSimpleFFT::TakeData(const KTEvent* event)
00057     {
00058         if (event->GetRecord()->GetSize() != fTransform->GetSize())
00059         {
00060             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::TakeData: Number of bins in the data provided does not match the number of bins set for this transform" << std::endl;
00061             return;
00062         }
00063         if (! fIsInitialized)
00064         {
00065             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::TakeData: FFT must be initialized before setting the data" << std::endl;
00066             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT, and then use the TakeData method of your choice to set the data" << std::endl;
00067             return;
00068         }
00069 
00070         fFreqBinWidth = event->GetSampleRate() / (Double_t)event->GetRecord()->GetSize();
00071         this->TakeData((TArray*)(event->GetRecord()));
00072         return;
00073     }
00074 
00075     void KTSimpleFFT::TakeData(const TArray* array)
00076     {
00077         if (array->GetSize() != fTransform->GetSize())
00078         {
00079             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::TakeData: Number of bins in the data provided does not match the number of bins set for this transform" << std::endl;
00080             return;
00081         }
00082         if (! fIsInitialized)
00083         {
00084             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::TakeData: FFT must be initialized before setting the data" << std::endl;
00085             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT, and then use the TakeData method of your choice to set the data" << std::endl;
00086             return;
00087         }
00088 
00089         for (Int_t iPoint=0; iPoint<array->GetSize(); iPoint++)
00090         {
00091             fTransform->SetPoint(iPoint, (Double_t)(array->GetAt(iPoint)));
00092         }
00093         fIsDataReady = kTRUE;
00094         return;
00095     }
00096 
00097     void KTSimpleFFT::Transform()
00098     {
00099         if (! fIsInitialized)
00100         {
00101             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::Transform: FFT must be initialized before the transform is performed" << std::endl;
00102             std::cerr << "   Please first call InitializeFFT(), then use a TakeData method to set the data, and then finally perform the transform." << std::endl;
00103             return;
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (! fIsDataReady)
00107         {
00108             std::cerr << "Warning from KTSimpleFFT::Transform: The data for the transform is not ready"<< std::endl;
00109             std::cerr << "   Please first call TakeData, and then perform the transform" << std::endl;
00110             return;
00111         }
00112 
00113         fTransform->Transform();
00114         return;
00115     }

00117     TH1D* KTSimpleFFT::CreatePowerSpectrumHistogram() const
00118     {
00119         KTPowerSpectrum* ps = this->CreatePowerSpectrum();
00120         TH1D* pshist = ps->CreateMagnitudeHistogram();
00121         delete ps;
00122         return pshist;
00123     }
00124 
00125     KTPowerSpectrum* KTSimpleFFT::CreatePowerSpectrum() const
00126     {
00127         // Extract the transformed data
00128         Int_t freqSize = this->GetFrequencySize();
00129         Double_t* freqSpecReal = new Double_t [freqSize];
00130         Double_t* freqSpecImag = new Double_t [freqSize];
00131         fTransform->GetPointsComplex(freqSpecReal, freqSpecImag);
00132 
00133         KTComplexVector* freqSpec = new KTComplexVector(freqSize, freqSpecReal, freqSpecImag, "R");
00134         delete [] freqSpecReal; delete [] freqSpecImag;
00135         (*freqSpec) *= 1. / (Double_t)this->GetTimeSize();
00136 
00137         KTPowerSpectrum* powerSpec = new KTPowerSpectrum();
00138         powerSpec->TakeFrequencySpectrum(*freqSpec);
00139         powerSpec->SetBinWidth(fFreqBinWidth);
00140         delete freqSpec;
00141         return powerSpec;
00142     }
